*   Orange underline under the heading.

*   French text for numbered instruction "2. Wear safety helmet and other protective equipment while using this product."

*   Line drawing of two figures on one electric scooter, front view (in top-left panel).
*   Red crossed circle symbol (in top-left panel).
*   Light grey rounded rectangular background for the top-left illustration panel.
*   Line drawing of a helmeted head in profile (in top-right panel).
*   Line drawing of a knee pad (in top-right panel).
*   Red checkmark in a circle symbol (in top-right panel).
*   Light grey rounded rectangular background for the top-right illustration panel.
*   French text for numbered instruction "3. Never ride this product in an unsafe or illegal place."
*   French text for numbered instruction "4. Please practice in an open area (not on lanes) first and use this product until you are skilled in operation."
*   Line drawing of a "no scooters" sign (scooter with a cross, in a circle, on a post) (in bottom-left panel).
*   Line drawing of a figure riding an electric scooter (in bottom-left panel).
*   Speed/motion lines behind the scooter (in bottom-left panel).

*   Line drawing of a figure on an electric scooter, front view, on a road (in bottom-right panel).
